member.name: M:Patagames.Pdf.Net.Controls.WinForms.PdfViewer.ClientToPage(System.Int32,System.Drawing.Point)
member.summary: Computes the location of the specified client point into page coordinates.
member.param: Page index. Can be obtained by method.
The client coordinate Point to convert.
member.returns: A Point that represents the converted Point, pt, in page coordinates.
member.exception: The page index is out of range
member.remarks: Permitted range of pages depends on the current view type and on some other parameters in the control.

The page coordinate Point to convert.
member.returns: A Point that represents the converted Point, pt, in client coordinates.
member.exception: The page index is out of range
member.remarks: Permitted range of pages depends on the current view type and on some other parameters in the control.

member.name: M:Patagames.Pdf.Net.Controls.WinForms.PdfViewer.LoadDocument(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Open and load a PDF document from a file.
member.param: Path to the PDF file (including extension)
A string used as the password for PDF file. If no password needed, empty or NULL can be used.
member.exception: unknown error
file not found or could not be opened
file not in PDF format or corrupted
password required or incorrect password
unsupported security scheme
Error occured in PDFium. See ErrorCode for detail

member.name: M:Patagames.Pdf.Net.Controls.WinForms.PdfViewer.LoadDocument(System.IO.Stream,System.String)
member.summary: Loads the PDF document from the specified stream.
member.param: The stream containing the PDF document to load. The stream must support seeking.
A string used as the password for PDF file. If no password needed, empty or NULL can be used.
member.exception: unknown error
file not found or could not be opened
file not in PDF format or corrupted
password required or incorrect password
unsupported security scheme
Error occured in PDFium. See ErrorCode for detail

remarks.note: The application should maintain the stream resources being valid until the PDF document close.

member.name: M:Patagames.Pdf.Net.Controls.WinForms.PdfViewer.LoadDocument(System.Byte[],System.String)
member.summary: Loads the PDF document from the specified byte array.
member.param: The byte array containing the PDF document to load.
A string used as the password for PDF file. If no password needed, empty or NULL can be used.
member.exception: unknown error
file not found or could not be opened
file not in PDF format or corrupted
password required or incorrect password
unsupported security scheme
Error occured in PDFium. See ErrorCode for detail

remarks.note: The application should not modify the byte array resources being valid until the PDF document close.
